lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: It's a good thing to help people in other countries were leading is inflexible torward small business.

lender.name: Ed
lender.loan_because: Have learned so much about life! hope to find that one special person to make a difference, from a technical way to a personal way!
lender.occupational_info: Very technical, build powerplants and inovate machines. Looking to help transform someone's life to a higher level with aid of machinery and technology.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: Money is like manure - if you spread it around, everything grows.

lender.name: G Whit
lender.loan_because: I worked in Africa while in Medical School and thus experienced the daily struggles of the developing world. I am in a position to help and the collective lending allows others like me to make a major impact in an individual, family, or community's livelihood.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Gastroenterologist or physician that diagnoses and treats illnesses that affect the digestive system. I also help prevent cancers by removing precancerous growths of the digestive tract.

lender.name: Debarah
lender.loan_because:
I was a single Mother for many years and my Mother helped finance several businesses that I owned. I will never forget her generosity.
I am an entrepreneur at heart and I believe that if I can invest in one small business as a start-up or help grow a business, that my reward is the success of the business owner.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Career Management Consultant and a Project Manager for a Learning Center for a major corporation.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: We should all be helping out.
lender.occupational_info: Rewarding...the best job in the world to be a mother.

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to have opportunities to accomplish their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I design & update web pages and printed publications at a small college.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: its cool!

lender.name: Brian & Alison
lender.loan_because: We want to assist others in building businesses that can have long term benefits for their families and those they serve.
lender.occupational_info: General Contractor - High end custom residential homes

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Introduced to Kiva by my brother and sister-in-law as an alternative to more typical Christmas gifts. What a great way to make a difference in the lives of others!
lender.occupational_info: I am an attorney and a business executive. In my spare time, I provide pro bono legal services, primarily to the immigrant community in my home town.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: To pay it forward.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I train and coach people that help our clients manage their bank accounts.

lender.name: Mary K.
lender.loan_because: I am on a spiritual path that assures me that we are all one. We are not alone. That is the illusion. If I can help another in need, to make their world a better place, I am helping myself as well. The world that I live in will become a better place, with happier, more joyous people. And that is the world I want to live in, so that is the world I choose to help create.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a teacher, in so many ways, all of my life. I believe it is what I am here to do this time around. I taught high school aged children, and then moved to teaching Executive Managers how to deal with the world and the way the world is changing. I also taught battered women and rape victims how to heal, and circles of women how to claim their power.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I want to see others achieve there goals
lender.occupational_info: Bicycle Sales, Repair and Nordic Ski Shop, AS well a Specialty coffee shop

lender.name: Mitch
lender.loan_because: I love seeing commerce in action. Enabling people to provide for each other is paramount to a stable culture.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the television news industry. So, I see hundreds of news stories every day about poverty and the impoverished.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: This gives others the opportunity to raise the quality of their lives.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to help people become self sufficient and improve their standard of living.
lender.occupational_info: We grow wine grapes, make wine and share it with family and friends. We also volunteer in many local charitable organizations that feed the hungry, cloth the poor, and work toward social justice in the USA as well as across the world.

lender.name: Jerome
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping those a good deal less fortunate than I am financially. I like to see where my money goes. I am the beneficiary when I see that others much better at it than I am, can make a living under much more trying circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I taught students who dropped out of school who came back to further their education (mostly single mothers) so they could get ahead. It was the most rewarding job I ever had.

lender.name: Mel
lender.loan_because: To make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I transport the future

lender.name: Amy & Bryan
lender.loan_because: We loan because we think it is a terrific way to help people that need that little extra push to help make them successful.
lender.occupational_info: Amy - runs her own company that helps other business with marketing and media to help make their business successful. Bryan - schedules people and trucks to deliver cookies from the warehouse to the stores.

lender.name: Rosalie
lender.loan_because: I want a little more equality in the world!

lender.name: Jessica + Nik
lender.occupation: Massage Therapist and Sheet Metal worker

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I loan because we are all connected; I canot love just my own children, my own family. We need each other, the world over, to bring about peace to this planet.
lender.occupational_info: I love people. I recently left a career of 23 years and now look to do the work of Spirit; I hope to make someone else's life a little easier. Well, it is now March 2009 and I have returned to work in the healthcare field. I help care for the elderly.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: it's good karma. I wouldn't be where I am today without the help of others, and I hope to give someone else the same leg up.
lender.occupational_info: I work on building controls systems - lighting, environmental controls, electronic locks, and so on.

lender.name: melis
lender.loan_because: i can (:
lender.occupational_info: suckksss.

lender.name: B. Anderson
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do...

lender.name: Godalo!
lender.loan_because: "Immigrating to the US from one of the world's poorest country, I know there is an intrinsic desire for these people to help themselves and not receive a handout. Pride and appreciation comes from looking at the fruits of labor, not dependence on others."

lender.name: The Taylors
lender.loan_because: our family was touched by the PBS special. God calls us to something bigger than ourselves.

lender.name: Andy Brown
lender.loan_because: Because it promotes world peace.
lender.occupational_info: I write and maintain computer software for finacial and medical applications.

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: this is an incredible way to help people.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I've been very fortunate in my life and feel others should have the same chance. This is one way I can help make that happen.
lender.occupational_info: I watch over other people's money.

lender.name: michelle and dan
lender.loan_because: we are all one
lender.occupational_info: assisting larger corporations and brands promote and market their products and services

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who want to make changes for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I do nutritional based research for non-human consumption.

lender.name: Percival
lender.loan_because: Despite controlling most of the world's capital, the developed world doesn't have a monopoly on entrepreneurship. I want to help entrepreneurs around the world succeed and grow their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I help people take control of their financial lives--and invest for their important life goals--by making sure they get the best advice possible.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: It treats people as equals.

lender.name: Parrot Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs get started.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired high school English teacher.

lender.name: Bernard & Sybil
lender.loan_because: We hope it will help people to live better.
lender.occupational_info: Sybil is a retired teacher and I am a semi-retired Professor Emeritus at California State University Northridge.

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: I would like to help others.

lender.name: Chris
lender.occupational_info: I use machines to organize information, and to help people make better decisions.

lender.name: Carrie & Evan & co.
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed and want to share that blessing with others.
lender.occupational_info: I love to spend time with my children and their little ones. I also do bookkeeping for my husband and sons in their businesses and am active with our church mission team. God is so good!

lender.name: Dylan
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate to be born where and when I was. I would like to help make the world just a little bit less desperate.
lender.occupational_info: I like to move things, and put things in new places and I love following my mom around and helping her by moving things.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: i enjoy helping people do what they love
lender.occupational_info: emergency responder... potential lifesaver.

lender.name: Esmael
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance and assistance especially those who don't have the means but the will to work hard to achieve their goals in life.
lender.occupational_info: A clinical specialist Registered Nurse in Liver, Kidney, and Pancreas transplant in San Francisco.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves trust and a chance to succeed, to feed their children and to enrich the lives of others around them.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wine merchant for a wonderfully Eco and community centric retailer. I evaluate wines to be sold in a Whole Foods Market in Napa, CA, USA. I interact with our store guests, vendors, brokers, winery owners and winemakers to bring the very best quality natural , sustainably-farmed, biodynamic and organic wines to our store.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I've always wanted to believe that one person can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I sell STUFF on ebay!

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: A little bit of money makes a big difference to someone else in the world. I graduated from Virginia Commonwealth University with a degree in Fashion Merchandising, and I'd love to help people with their businesses who also have a passion for fashion.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I LOVE
lender.occupational_info: I teach college students how to use photo equipment and I make videos that look like living paintings.

lender.name: Len
lender.loan_because: I believe it can work - we have to rely on each other in this world, no one can do it alone. At the moment, I'm pretty lucky in my life and I am glad to be able to share that with others to help them get to a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a healthcare industry as a manager in their technical services.

lender.name: Staley
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it possible! What a great concept. Thanks for making this wonderful opportunity available to both recipients and the lenders. This is the kind of thing that makes our world a community.
lender.occupational_info: I work for 2 specialty eBook stores called CurrClick.com and EcoBrain.com. These sites sell books in digital format about homeschooling and environmentally friendly living, respectively.(Digital books are great for the environment!)

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because: I think it's a wonderful way to encourage people who may otherwise not be able to succed in a business.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student and involved in real estate investments, I also have a small business renting oceanfront condos' in Southern California.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Working with people on how to use digital information and communication technologies across various lifestyles.

lender.name: Earl
lender.occupation: Chief of Logistics OSCE Kovovo Mission
lender.occupational_info: I manage the Logistics Division, which includes Supply, Warehousing, Transport, Travel and Asset Management for the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe's Mission in Kosovo

lender.name: Atlanta R
lender.loan_because: I want to help people escape poverty.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I hope I can make a difference in someone's life

lender.name: Isabella
lender.loan_because: I would like to see women in need become independent
lender.occupational_info: Busily being retired!

lender.name: Lori & Chad
lender.loan_because: 'I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me.'

lender.name: Janet M.
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to share a little of what God has given me.

lender.name: Acquitaine Capital LLC
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is an excellent way to build a better world.

lender.name: Jeanette
lender.loan_because: It feels great to do it. I think one by one we can make a huge difference in the quality of people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist working in digital media.

lender.name: Walker
lender.loan_because: I like the ability to directly help in-need entrepreneurs, rather than sending money through a middleman.

lender.name: Dustin
lender.loan_because: this is capitalism at its greatest. Helping someone without treating them like a charity case strikes a particularly close chord with me as someone affected by Hurricane Katrina.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I spent my working career helping people achieve their goals in life through savings and prudent use of credit. The KIVA program allows me to continue this in my retirement.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a volunteer advisor for CESO, an organization that allows retired persons assist business people in developing parts of the world.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I want to help other entrepreneurs in the world who don't have the resources available to them that they need to grow and support themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I make all-natural bath and body products myself; I understand the difficulties involved in having your own business.

lender.name: Keith-Lisa
lender.loan_because: We have everything. Its our responsibility to give back.
lender.occupational_info: We are in the food and service industry. Keith is a chef de cuisine with lots on management experience. Lisa is a self employed entrepreneur having many years of small business management. We have both travelled a lot and want to show our appreciation of how good others have been to us. Pass it on!!

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because:
Today, more than ever before, life must be characterized by a sense of Universal responsibility, not only nation to nation and human to human, but also human to other forms of life.
Dalai Lama

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner. I know how difficult it can be at times. I want to help people who may not have had the same advantages i have had.
lender.occupational_info: I transport Building materials.

lender.name: Keith
lender.occupational_info: I tune and repair pianos

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I like to see others succed in business.
lender.occupational_info: Trade financial instruments short term.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I like to help people in need.

lender.name: Alec
lender.loan_because: I want to help others in need

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because:
I am blessed to have enough. But so many of the people that live in my community forget that they have enough, because they are focused on what they don't have, and what they think they need to be happy. Sometimes I forget too. This is a wonderful opportunity for me to remember, and to share what I can, instead of spending it on something that I don't need, so others may feel blessed too.
I love the idea of Kiva because it mirrors what the organization I work for accomplishes in our community, which is creating a cooperative of financial success.
lender.occupational_info:
I work for a credit union, which is a not-for-profit bank. The credit union philosophy is "People Helping People," so our business is not about making a profit, but about guiding people to make good choices with their money. I work with businesses and the local University to help consumers join the Credit Union as members. A big part of my job is educating the community about consumer and financial issues, and I often work with college students to teach them about managing their finances and understanding how credit works in America.
I also sing in a band and teach voice lessons.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I believe in the ability of people to lift themselves up when given the right resources and support from their community.

lender.name: Kallie Larsen
lender.occupational_info: I sit in classrooms and listen to people talk and talk and talk and I write it all down because supposedly it will be pertinent in later life.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am very supportive of people who have the initiative, courage and strength to take care of themselves and their families in challenging economic environments.
lender.occupational_info: Work is challenging here, though in different ways, of course. I typically work 60+ hours per week in a high stress sector, but I love what I do and the people I work with are like a second family.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: humans help one another.

lender.name: Geraldo
lender.loan_because: I support creative people.
lender.occupational_info: I make pictures that help to explain complicated things or ideas. I am self-employed - My spouse and I have our own company.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: It's fun to see entrepreneurs starting new businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a computer programmer and specialize in internet business systems.

lender.name: Naomi
lender.loan_because: We are all related and my money is your money and your happiness is my happiness!
lender.occupational_info: I study plants and teach others about these green wonders.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I know this money is going for a direct purpose. I love that I can help people directly in their own businesses. Taking banks out of the equation is a wonderful thing!

lender.name: Kaitlynn
lender.loan_because: I want to help save our planet one corner, and one person at a time. I want people to breathe a little bit easier because i am here, and i am ready and willing to help you out.
lender.occupational_info: I am a creative person, who enjoys having fun and being around people and helping save our planet. I would really like to become a writer, and travel, and do everything i can to help other people and make their lives a little bit easier.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of small locally owned businesses to empower people and sustain regional economies.
lender.occupational_info: Install and repair automatic monitoring equipment to gage stream flow , water quality, rainfall, temperature and wind. I'm an independent contractor with my own small business.

lender.name: Raili
lender.loan_because: We travel a lot and have seen people's needs. This is one thing we, my husband Tappari and I, can do. Thanks to Kiva for this wonderful possibility.
lender.occupational_info: I have written more than 50 books mostly for children and youth but some also for adults. A couple of them are of children in foreign countries to strengthen understanding among us.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves.

lender.name: lynne Okon
lender.loan_because: there is so much need in this world and I wish to be of service and to leave a legacy.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired psychotherapist who is now a sculptor. I love working in stone . I am now deeply involved in painting with oil paints. I also teach people to write poetry who think they can't . Then they see that they can.

lender.name: Raina
lender.loan_because: I want to help others and know who they are. As a middle-class American, it's very easy to become sheltered. I think this is a fantastic way to learn about the world
lender.occupational_info: I recently completed my Master's degree in Library Studies and am looking for my first professional job.

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: this is a worthwhile project. I believe everyone should have the opportunity to improve their lives

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I want to support resourceful individuals in business where most needed and useful and want to know something about who I am helping.

lender.name: Coleen
lender.loan_because: my older brother gave me a Kiva loan certificate as a Christmas gift. I think it is a really great idea.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in grade 9

lender.name: Myles
lender.loan_because: the world needs all the help it can get

lender.name: John E.
lender.loan_because: I want to help people improve their lives by enabling them to better earn their living.
lender.occupational_info: Develop new drugs to treat disease.

lender.name: Marjorie & Gene
lender.loan_because: It was a gift to us to lend to someone else.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help people with the capital for their business so that they can provide for their family and grow their business.
lender.occupational_info: I provide financing and cash management services for large and small businesses as well as high net worth individuals.

lender.name: Lia
lender.occupation: i' m like only 11, so i don't really have one

lender.name: The Nickersons
lender.loan_because: Our friends gave us a Kiva gift certificate for Christmas and we think it's a great concept. We feel very fortunate and want to help others but we haven't felt informed on how to do this safely and effectively. So thanks to our friends the Nagels for introducing us to Kiva. This seems like a reliable and trackable way to help by lending and then do it all over again.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I was given $100 as a gift to help others

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: Spent 2 yr in Sierra Leone as Peace Corps Volunteer and understand that building economic well being is major part of solution to health for all citizens of a country.
lender.occupational_info: I work in mortgage finance industry and help others understand how to borrow money within their means so they can repay it and improve their economic well being

lender.name: Mark & Dina
lender.occupation: Computer Guy, Housewife and growing baby
lender.loan_because: i want to give, as i've been given and help others who are praying for help to come from anywhere, somewhere, sometime soon.
lender.occupational_info: My husband fixes other people's computers for a living. I stay home and raise our daughter, cook, bake, and do various volunteer activities to stay active and help the community.

lender.name: An American Family
lender.loan_because: we want to teach our children the importance of giving to help others improve their lives and the lives of their children.
lender.occupational_info: Mr. AmFam is an lawyer who represents big companies. Mrs. AmFam cares for our two daughters. Our daughters are 4 and 1 1/2 years old.

lender.name: Alexa
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: Help people find information on the internet

lender.name: Kevin
lender.occupation: looking for that dare to be great opportunity..

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: it's direct participation and the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large West Coast Port as the Real Estate Leasing Manager

lender.name: Chip & Cam
lender.loan_because: We're lucky to have what we have. Spread that luck around a bit.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.occupational_info: I teach beginning physics classes, to support myself while getting my PH.D.

lender.name: Lexie
lender.loan_because: Sharing is caring. It's simple, it's the right thing to do to give someone a helping hand when in need.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a student at University of Waterloo in Ontario, Canada. I'm studying business and political science.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I can and I should.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large healthcare company. My job is assisting our customers when they have discrepancies on the bills that we charge them for our product.

lender.name: Paige
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Santa Clara University, I am currently studying business.

lender.name: Harry
lender.loan_because: I believe that this is the most effective way to provide money to help people get themselves a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses with supply chain, transportation and logistics problems.

lender.name: Sarah & Nate
lender.loan_because: It's a small thing that can make a big impact. We believe in the benefits of community. Therefore, as a couple, we try and support local business and help the people in our community. We also know that as US citizens, we are blessed with great opportunities for health, wealth and wellbeing. These are opportunities that many other deserving people around the globe do not have. It is our intent and hope that our small contributions of faith, encouragement and support in the form of a 'KIVA' loan will enable these deserving entrepreneurs to bring their dreams to fruition.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I want to see hard-working people given a chance to get ahead

lender.name: jackie
lender.loan_because: I hope I am making a positve change for someone. I feel blessed to be a part of their lives in this small way.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can; I find lending to be pretty fun, and inspiring.
lender.occupational_info: I work in research and development for petrochemicals and renewable fuels.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: It gives me a chance to have a positive impact on the lives of people who aren't as fortunate and privileged as I am.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great idea. I pray it flourishes as it connects us across the world, and brings both parties great benefits.
lender.occupational_info: I solicit contributions for scholarship support to deserving college students.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to sow seeds in others -so that they will in turn do something for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: My Primary function is to build relationships with my Customers.

lender.name: Big D
lender.loan_because: I want to help other earthlings that are working hard to better the lives of themselves, their family, and others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a grain of sand on the beach. Trying to make a difference.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: It is nice knowing I can do something to change someone else's life.

lender.name: Toni and Cliff
lender.loan_because: Everything I ever needed to know about life I learned in Kindergarden...#1...Share!

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I am a very fortunate person and I believe that good fortune obligates me to try to help others out. It's all about karma.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a communications company that specializes in helping authors get publicity.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: Being so little I can relate to the idea that small things can have a big impact. And, I believe I'm bound for greatness, and I realize I'll get a lot of help along the way to make the most of my potential. So I figured I'd start giving back early. Positive intentions hopefully will create some good karma down the road. Lastly, I loan because my Mum & Dad want me to be mindful of others around me and to find ways to help improve the world I live in.
lender.occupational_info: Mummy says my main job is to be "nice, cute and happy". Which is pretty easy to do most of the time as long as I'm fed and have a clean diaper. And I help my Mum & Dad keep their perspective about what's important in the long run.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Supporting and empowering people. Rewarding!

lender.name: Brantley
lender.occupational_info: I seek out opportunities to learn something new very day and share what I have learned with others. These experiences have proven to be key in my growth both personally and professionally. I am often challenged with problems that require me to develop solutions that appear unconventional, but this is what makes me creative, unique and identifiable.

lender.name: Marybeth
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful organization that allows me to feel like I can help someone else in a small way. Usually I might give money but I don't know how it is used, this is specific and lets me make decisions on where my money goes and to whom it goes to.
lender.occupational_info: I do a bit of everything from data base management to teaching children fire safety.

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a shot!
lender.occupational_info: We clean and restore high-end chandeliers in the Los Angeles area....

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I am 8 years old and am in grade 2.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: What a great thing to do... Help Someone
lender.occupational_info: We have a small Imprinted Sportswear business in Virginia

lender.name: Lucy and Bill
lender.loan_because: We're lucky to have our health, a good roof over our heads, and happy lives. We hope this can make a difference for someone else.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I am 8 years old and am in Grade two.

lender.name: LYNN
lender.loan_because: I was a single mother on welfare with 3 children and no one to help me
lender.occupational_info: I CREATE BEAUTIFUL HOMES FOR PEOPLE

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner in the US, I've been afforded many opportunities for success. I want to share that success by helping enable small businesses in other areas to grow and flourish.
lender.occupational_info: I design print and interactive advertising for small-to-midsize businesses.

lender.name: gerry grand bend canada
lender.loan_because: wonderful xmas gift from Kara , Geoff, Laurie Ann,Jake and Lucie

lender.name: Road Angels
lender.loan_because: I'm humbled to know that i can, in a small way, help people across the world gain economic independence and maybe even help achieve their lifelong dreams.

lender.name: Celestine
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate that I can.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because:
I can.
KIVA is a great way to help people help themselves!

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting women in developing countries who are trying to start/continue/build their own businesses in order to support themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for the students, staff, and parents in an elementary school of 450 low-income students.

lender.name: Ileene
lender.loan_because: I can and my life is blessed
lender.occupational_info: Assistant to the director of the world recognized University Of Texas /Center For Space Research involved in Earth Sciences and environmentally sensitive & beneficial science

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: As a citizen of our global community, I feel this is one of the best ways I can make a positive contribution to support it.
lender.occupational_info: I make and teach the making of music. I am a musician, composer and university professor. I study the music of all cultures and strive to find identify the similarities and uniqueness between them.

lender.name: phillip Wister
lender.loan_because: I want others in the world to know Americans and not the United States.
lender.occupational_info: I help people sort out their problems with a kind heart and keen ear.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I think people should help each other out.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer and theater actor in New York City and New England.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: This type of investment is too good to pass up.
lender.occupational_info: I write software for geographic information systems (maps and imagery).

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I sell internet equipment to the US Government

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I feel it is my way of paying forward all that has been given to me, it feels good to know you helped a person or family get ahead and to know blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time Mom, student, and future teacher for elementary age children.

lender.name: Carol Dean
lender.loan_because: I can. I am blessed to be able to do what I love without having to support myself doing it. I also believe that you can't receive things in life if you aren't giving them as well.
lender.occupational_info: I spend hours weaving tiny beads together to create beautiful adornments.

lender.name: adewale
lender.loan_because: iam a farmer i produce fish feeds and also have small fish farm , i need a loan of $1200 to buy big machine and expand my fish farm
lender.occupational_info: my work is very demanding and interesting, i believe the loan will make me employ labours and increase my feeds production in order to meet daily demands

lender.name: Ghen
lender.loan_because: This is an amazing way to be of service to someone who will make an impact on his/her part of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am called a pencil head, a pencil pusher, a bean counter, but what I actually do is keep assets secure for the company and its board of directors, debtors, and shareholders.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: To start or expand a business enables someone to provide for themselves, their family, and their community.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist who owns a stationary business, Red Aphrodite. I am also a teacher at a community college teaching English to non-native speakers of English.

lender.name: Teri
lender.loan_because: I admire people who are willing to work hard to help themselves. I'm fortunate enough to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an attorney and work with American Indian tribes.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: As a citizen of the earth I want to do good. God has blessed me with a little extra money and others should have the opportunity to improve their lives with these blessings as well.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit organization whose motto is: "Feeding the world through responsible aquaculture." We work to ensuring that there will be enough seafood to feed everyone by promoting safe aquaculture practices.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because:
I believe the people receiving the loans are working so hard to better their lives. We can all use a helping hand every once in a while.
I don't have a lot of money to give. But together we can make a big impact. It reminds me of a Japanese saying my that goes, "Even dust, if accumulated, will become a mountain."
lender.occupational_info: I work at a homeless shelter. We provide shelter, food, legal aide, and some medical care to homeless in our community. We work together to help them find jobs and their own housing.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: We're making a difference thanks to Kiva. Seedlings of prosperity are reaching those in need.

lender.name: Cassie
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed with opportunities in my life that may help others.

lender.name: Aaron Krowne
lender.loan_because: grassroots capitalism is the only legitimate kind
lender.occupational_info: i am a commentator and activist of political economy, as well as a "technologist"

lender.name: Donal
lender.loan_because: as an individual I may not get a chance to change the course of history, but I can change the course of a family's history.
lender.occupational_info: I use a computer to create beautiful images, help businesses prosper, and teach others how to create their own artwork.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of being involved in microlending and social entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computer systems.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help others make a difference in their own lives and in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I buy things from people who no longer want them and sell them to people who do want them, on eBay. I also teach others how to start their own business selling on eBay.

lender.name: Kristina
lender.loan_because: I want people that are having hard times to know that there are people all over the world that care about them. I think that and the money is a good thing :)
lender.occupational_info: I protect and serve the public..by inforce laws and helping people with body aches and pains too. I am a voice for animals being neglected or abused as well.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I am a self-employed woman and I want to support other women entrepreneurs. I have seen the success of micro-lending and I want to be a part of it. And - it feels good! I urge my friends to join me.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the right to a chance at seeing their dream come true.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Spanish and Portuguese language, literature, and culture to University of Minnesota students.

lender.name: scorpiovixen2006
lender.loan_because: helping others makes a difference no matter how much you give.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mommy. That is my most important and fulfilling job.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: The impact of a small $25 loan can change someone's life. The rewards are countless!

lender.name: marc
lender.loan_because: Those who are more fortunate than others should share the wealth; you can't take it with you.
lender.occupational_info: I sell food products imported from Germany into the U.S. market

lender.name: Bart
lender.loan_because: people need help. What I really like is that a relatively small amount of money can help a lot in some parts of the world.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: My daughter gave me a Kiva gift certificate for Christmas. I hope it helps somebody to become successful in a small business!
lender.occupational_info: I educated people on how to use the information in their companies' computer systems.

lender.name: Cliff
lender.loan_because: I care about helping other people on this planet be independent, creative, and free.
lender.occupational_info: hunting, catching, and selling wild Alaska salmon

lender.name: Perry
lender.loan_because: I have a soft spot for anyone who works to deliver the goodness of bacon and/or alcohol throughout the world. Furniture makers and people working on bicycles are high on the list of favorites. I also try to show the places America has done less than her best that at least some of us are interested in making amends.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a software quality engineer, working for a company that makes test and measurement equipment.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Giving a fellow human being the tools to begin a small business is much more valuable than a handout.
lender.occupational_info: i work with business and local government to help, in a small way, to create a sustainable society.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: Kiva offers a unique and effective way to help people who are working with dignity to overcome hardships that are not of their own making. With love, I "cast my bread upon the water"... it comes back to me...and I send it out again. The impact of collective small gifts is breath-taking!
lender.occupational_info:
I teach English as a Second Language to persons from all over the world at the local community college.
I also substitute in elementary schools where children from many countries attend.

lender.name: cliff538
lender.loan_because: To love my neighbor!
lender.occupational_info: I fly airplanes and commercial fish for salmon.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: It is important to tangibly love others the way Jesus loves me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time mother of three young children and the wife of a pastor (whom I love deeply).

lender.name: Katherine Aaron
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to demonstrate love - both for myself (because it feels good) and for others (because it assists them on their journey).
lender.occupational_info: I channel Guidance who bring clarity from the perspective of your Highself called Channeled Life Readings. I do energywork & mind-body-spirit consultations, too. My degrees are in naturopathic medicine and counseling. A portion of my income supports KIVA and several other wonderful non-profits.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: marlene
lender.loan_because: Luke is my grandson and we do this together. I do it because we are lucky in Australia and it's a small thing to do that makes a huge difference to someone not so lucky. It teaches Luke to be generous and that it feels good to give to others, even people that you don't know.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to help themselves and their families have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I make very special dolls which I designed and copyrighted. They are called Inspiration dolls because they are meant to inspire and give comfort and healing to their recipient.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people make a go of it.
lender.occupational_info: I provide psychiatric treatment to people with severe mental illness, many of whom are homeless.

lender.name: Sarita
lender.occupational_info: I care for children.

lender.name: Saskia
lender.loan_because: I too have my own business and I want to help others to have successful businesses of their own, especially in places where it is more difficult to do so than in the United States. I want to help improve other people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I use acupressure (Traditional Chinese Medicine), aromatherapy (essential oils), and Bach flowers (English emotional remedies) to improve the lives of horses.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate to live in Canada with good health and happiness, I like to help others when possible

lender.name: Jolie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who work hard at improving their lives.
lender.occupational_info: My work is school - learning stuff.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 4th grade in a fairly large city. I teach math, english, social studies, science and writing.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: True to the cliché, I want to "make the world a smaller place". And I think small yet meaningful contributions can change the world--or at least the world of one person. And that's important.
lender.occupational_info: I teach writing and research writing instruction, theories of writing, and all the sorts of ways in which we make meaning in our culture.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: Michael Milken stated it better than I ever could when he said "I came to realize that civil rights meant more than where you could sit on a bus, or eat lunch, or attend school. It also encompassed the chance to start a business and succeed or fail on your own merit."

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: It's a small world. We are all a big neighborhood and I believe in neighbors helping neighbors.
lender.occupational_info: I manage large technology projects that build new online products for our customers.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: To make the world a smaller and happier place. Also to pay tribute to my mother that has recently passed. I was taught that social justice and compassion will make me a better man.
lender.occupational_info: I like to make people smile.

lender.name: Payton
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know that I'm helping other people .

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: i want to be part some ones life in a good way and this is one way i can. its my way of helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a 8th grade student in Suwanee, Georgia

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I have the money sitting in a savings account anyway, why not put it to good use!
lender.occupational_info: I am a doula :) I provide emotional, physical and informational support to women during pregnancy and birth so that they can have an empowered and positive birth experience.

lender.name: Murph
lender.loan_because: I would like to assist others who are attempting to grow...

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: It's easy and it lifts some one off their feet
lender.occupational_info: I learn

lender.name: Lara
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner myself and appreciate the ongoing need for capital investment to move forward.

lender.name: Kirstan
lender.loan_because: Peace in our world can only be achieved when each person can provide for themselves and have a little stability and control over their future.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a small school for 15 to 19 year olds. Not all of our students have had the most stable lives so far. We teach and learn as a community and try to teach not only the acedemic basics but also the humanitarian basics.

lender.name: Jan Ragnar
lender.loan_because: I got this Kiva loan-thing as a gift certificate for Chirtmas, and I was very pleaced. So no I can help in giving a loan. Thats nice.
lender.occupational_info: I am a assistant professor i fine arts and drama at Telemark University College in Norway. My main job is to educate preschoolteachers to work in cindergardens with smal children.

lender.name: Coghan
lender.loan_because: I like to help people in need, but I don't like giving just for a handout because I don't think that helps a person to grow and feel good about themselves. I feel giving with the idea that it may help someone to create more wealth in their lives will create more wealth in my own life.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who have become unhappy or discouraged to find their inner strength and learn to love themselves and feel good about themselves again so that they can attain prosperity and happiness.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: i feel i need to give back what i was given and by that i mean i want to help as many people as i can.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: i'm fortunate to live a great life in a great place and simply want to pass this blessing on to others and increase development throughout the world
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student aspiring to work in international public health

lender.name: Brandon
lender.occupational_info: I do accounting for a huge company that treats me like crap. At nights I work as a coach and fighter competing in Jiu-Jitsu and MMA.

lender.name: Kelsey
lender.loan_because: I spent a semester in Ecuador and met the sorts of people who could have benefited from a little extra money like this. There is a big part of my heart that is still in South America. I'm loaning for my friends in Ecuador, in hopes that a blessing like this might one day find them as well.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: We are blessed to have so many luxuries. This is a great way to really make a difference in our world and to help others who are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I recently graduated and obtained a bachelor of science degree in Speech Communication with a concentrtion in Public Relations.

lender.name: Andres
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a break, I hope to contribute so that others can make a more significant contribution to their families and themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher at a Kinder to Secondary (2 to 18 year old) School in Mexico city. I teach the older students

lender.name: John & Jolene
lender.loan_because: I learned about these programs during a JustFaith experience and I believe they are quite benficial. I want to help my brothers and sisters.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mediator and work to implement restorative justice practices while getting communities to support juvenile offenders as they return to community.

lender.name: ELUNED
lender.loan_because: poverty affects everyone no matter where you live
lender.occupational_info: customer service for publications

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: the smallest action makes the biggest difference.

lender.name: Sumner McKenzie
lender.loan_because: What a cool way to assist others in building their business!
lender.occupational_info: We do all things computer - John McKenzie sets up computer systems, helps people troubleshoot problems and creates databases while Chaela Sumner designs web sites, flyers, brocures, business cards and ads.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I enjoy giving!
lender.occupational_info: I am a project manager for a company that rebuilds roads and bridges.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I hope to give the chance of following ones dream.

lender.name: Cathie
lender.loan_because: I want small business owners to have a head start and get the products they need to produce income
lender.occupational_info: Service to families by taking care of their children

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: Sometimes people just need a little bit of help getting started. I have been very fortunate in business and want to "pay it forward".

lender.name: Rico
lender.loan_because:
I grew up very poor, but was fortunate to have the opportunity to get an education and earn a decent living. It is a pleasure to be part of such a helpful organization.
The mere mention of global poverty intimidates people. We think that the problem is too big and hopeless.
It's organizations like Kiva that empower us as individuals so that we make the right choice, and do what we can to help. As many, we are strong. The tipping point may be just a few years away.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a popular internet search engine.

lender.name: KINDALL
lender.loan_because: Help make a difference for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a bank and help customers get a loan to buy a home.

lender.name: Robert and Jo
lender.loan_because: We've spent much time in the developing countries and have wanted to help in other tangible ways. With Kiva, we feel we have a structure that works and is accountable.
lender.occupational_info: We have spent time teaching journalism and design in Namibia, Vietnam, Cambodia, Singapore, Malaysia, India, Sri Lanka, Nepal, Bhutan, Pakistan, Borneo.
